summary: Tested checkout page conditional rendering feature for logged-in vs guest customers. All 3 test scenarios passed: (1) Guest checkout shows name/phone/email input fields, (2) Logged-in checkout shows 'Logged in as:' display box with read-only customer details instead of input fields, (3) Logged-in customer can successfully place order with pre-filled data.

Guest user checkout shows input fields for email (data-testid='checkout-email-input')
Guest user checkout does NOT show 'Logged in as:' text

Logged-in user checkout shows 'Logged in as:' display box
